short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize web pages with scripts and styles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Web helps you customize the web your own way.
Whether it's a broken website, or just an extra feature you want to add.

It accomplishes this by allowing you to:
- Create/Edit scripts and styles for pages you specify
- Import/Export said scripts and styles
- Enable or disable them directly through the popup
- See which ones are running on the current page

This project is open source, the source code can be found in:
https://github.com/BrunoFCvo/CustomWeb
You can use this page to send feedback and help us improve the extension.
